Ternopil State Medical University Ukraine

  • About Ternopil State Medical University
  • Indian Student Admission Procedure
  • {" "} Eligibility Criteria of Ternopil State Medical University
  • {" "} Requirements for MBBS Admission

About Ternopil State Medical University

Ternopil National Medical University is one of the{" "} top medical university in Ukraine{" "} {" "} that was established in 1957. It has got the 3rd rank with IVth highest level of accreditation by Ministry of Health and Education in Ukraine. Approx 10,000 students are studying medical course at this{" "} medical university in Ukraine . The medium of instruction in Ternopil National Medical University is English language. This university is accredited by the MCI & WHO.

Indian Student Admission Procedure

Indian students need to follow the below steps to take admission in the top MBBS college in Ukraine:

  • {" "} The eligible students will get an invitation letter from the University via mail or by courier.
  • {" "} They should submit an invitation letter to the Embassy of Ukraine for applying for a student visa.
  • {" "} Once they receive a student visa, they must inform to the International Students Office of Ternopil National Medical University.
  • {" "} Then the student needs to signs an agreement with the university and pay the tuition fee for the 1st year.

Eligibility Criteria of Ternopil State Medical University

The eligibility criteria of the students who want to study MBBS in the best medical university in Ukraine are as follows:

  • {" "} The students should have science in their 12th standard and should have an aggregate of 50% marks in physics, chemistry, and Biology.
  • {" "} The students should be at least 17 years of age to take admission in the top MBBS college in Ukraine.
  • {" "} The students should also qualify for the NEET exam with passing marks to apply for taking admission to the{" "} best medical university in Ukraine.
  • {" "} The students should have English subject in their higher secondary.
  • {" "} The students must not be more than 25 years of age.
Requirements for MBBS Admission

The necessary documents for taking admission in{" "} MCI approved medical colleges in Ukraine are the following:

  • {" "} A complete filled application form with all accurate details.
  • {" "} Original and photocopies of Passport.
  • {" "} Birth certificates and other mandatory certificates must be submitted to the concerned authority.
  • {" "} Passport size (3cmX4cm) photographs.
  • {" "} Original and a photocopy of mark sheets of both 10th & 12th standard
  • {" "} A scorecard of NEFT (if required)
  • {" "} Transfer certificate from the previous school
  • {" "} Leaving certificate from the concerned school
  • {" "} A certificate of code of conduct must be submitted
  • {" "} The bank copy of guardians must be submitted which indicates that they have sufficient funds to pay the fees.
  • {" "} A medical checkup certificate is also essential
Ternopil State Medical University Fee Structure
Particular Annual Fee
Fee in USD (approx) 4,400
Fee in Indian Rupees (approx) 3,08,000
Ternopil State Medical University Facility

Ternopil State Medical University provides the following facilities:

  • {" "} It provides multistoried hostels facilities at very low price.
  • {" "} The hostel rooms are equipped with Wifi and high speed internet.
  • {" "} This university encourages the students to participate in sports and cultural activities.
Ternopil State Medical University Advantages for Indian Student

Ternopil State Medical University provides the following advantages to the Indian students:

  • {" "} There is no requirement of any entrance test for taking admission in this top MBBS college in Ukraine
  • {" "} It provides high-quality education at reasonable fees.
  • {" "} The degree awarded in this university is globally recognized by an international corporation.
  • {" "} The cost of living in Ukraine is affordable for Indian students.
  • {" "} The students get the theoretical & some practical knowledge of medical science in the first 5 years & the last 1 year is distributed for the internship in private & government affiliated hospitals.
New-Lyf Authorized Indian Partner

New-Lyf education is the authorized Indian partner with the best{" "} medical university in Ukraine. We have already placed hundreds of Indian students in Ukraine for pursuing{" "} MBBS course in Ternopil State Medical University {" "} that taught MBBS course in English language. We have an expert team of consultants that provide well-researched assistance & comprehensive counseling to the students. We provide complete information about Ternopil State Medical University and clear each doubt of the students so that they can study medical course in the top MBBS college in Ukraine and fulfill their wish.

Dr Vinit Kumar is a Educational Consultant for India & Abroad with more than 18 Years of Experience.He has an extensive background guiding & assisting medical students to find the best university as per their budget.✔3500 + Students✔ 15 Countries✔ MBBS, MBA, PG, UG✔ 100 % Commitment✔ Education Loan✔ Job Placements
